comments.raw_text: In ETP fission work, we have moved the user interaction check to either the parent process or same-origin content processes, which means we don't have to put user interaction permission (storageAccessAPI) in the preload list.
comments.creator: dlee@mozilla.com
comments.text: In ETP fission work, we have moved the user interaction check to either the parent process or same-origin content processes, which means we don't have to put user interaction permission (storageAccessAPI) in the preload list.
comments.author: dlee@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text:
We add storageAccessAPI permission to perload list in Bug 1499442.

In the recent ETP fission works, we have ensured that the user interaction
permission check can only happen either in the parent process or in the
content processes that load principal to check. This means we don't need
to preload it anymore.
comments.text:
Created attachment 9154864
Bug 1644073 - Remove storageAccessAPI permission from preload list r=baku


We add storageAccessAPI permission to perload list in Bug 1499442.

In the recent ETP fission works, we have ensured that the user interaction
permission check can only happen either in the parent process or in the
content processes that load principal to check. This means we don't need
to preload it anymore.
comments.author: dlee@mozilla.com
comments.creator: dlee@mozilla.com
